Class Ice

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Moveable
        • Block
          • Ice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Direction, Timed

    public class Ice
extends Block
implements Timed
    This class represents a block of ice in the game world. A block of ice acts like a normal block, but moves at a rate of 0.25 tiles per second when pushed.
